document_data.name: Mantiera
document_data.mainbody: '''Mantiera''' was a [[human]] [[druid]] who enjoyed shapeshifting into the form of a [[seal]].
document_data.Description: In her seal form, Mantiera had brownish-black skin. The only telltale mark of her true nature was the red medallion fastened around her neck.
document_data.Personality: She preferred taking the form of a seal primarily because she liked the feeling of water on her fur. She liked swimming alone, but would occasionally travel alongside friendly seal families.
document_data.Abilities: She was unusually dexterous, making her difficult for foes to land a blow on.
document_data.Possessions: Mantiera owned a ''[[medallion of thought projection]]''.
